short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your browsing by blocking unwanted sites with custom keywords and redirecting them to a safe URL for a healthier experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyword Manager Pro is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you regain control of your online experience and break free from addictive behaviors. By blocking access to websites associated with gambling, social media, or other harmful habits, and redirecting to a safe URL, this tool helps you stay focused, protect your privacy, and create a healthier online environment. Whether you're struggling with addiction or just looking to improve your browsing habits, Keyword Manager Pro is an essential tool for anyone seeking to reduce distractions and foster a more mindful internet experience. Ideal for individuals, parents, and those aiming to overcome digital addictions.
